content: rroommaannttiicc sspprriinngg sskkiirrtt aanndd ppoonncchhoo sseett mmuullttii--ssiizzeedd ppaatttteerrnn 1122mm--66xx materials 8oz pink baby yarn 1 5 oz white baby yarn ¼ elastic crochet hook size g yarn needle guage 4 5 sts to 1 2 row=1 designed by annastasia cruz copyright owned by annastasia cruz skirt changes are as follows 12m 18-24m 2t-3t 4-5 6&6x please note that on both the poncho and skirt more stitches and row can easily be added or taken away for a better fit 12m-3t chain 102 for up to 19 waist if waist is larger then do larger size for waist but do smaller in length 4-6x chain 132 for up to 24 waist if waist is larger then add more chain in multiples of 3 round 1 slip_stitch to form a ring making sure not to twist chain 3 double_crochet in each chain around slip_stitch to top of chain 3 rnds 2-14 1-16 2-19 2-21 2-24 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around slip_stitch to top here is where you may do more or less rnds if desired just a note the 3 white shell rnds are about 2 change to white round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in same st chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st skip 2 double_crochet work shell of *2dc chain 2 2dc* in next st skip 2dc repeat around slip_stitch to top rnds 2-3 slip_stitch to next chain 2 space single_crochet 3 double_crochet in same space chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space in next space work shell repeat around slip_stitch to top finish off sew in ends elastic waist cut a piece of elastic the same length as around the child s waist over lap the 2 ends ½ to ¾ inch and sew securely together now working in the free loops of chain sts at waist hold the elastic right over the chain insert hook in chain will be under elastic pull through a loop now with hook over elastic yo and pull through 2 loops on hook you just did a single_crochet over the elastic now single_crochet in each st around over the elastic so that the elastic will be incased inside the single_crochet sts finish off sewin ends poncho 12-24m chain 50 2t-3t chain 60 4-5 chain 70 6&6x chain 80 please note that in these row it may not end up ending perfectly you may end up with to many or too few sts after the last increase but that is ok slip_stitch to first chain to form a ring making sure to not twist round 1- chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 chain 2dc in next double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top round-2 chain 3 double_crochet in next 4 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top round-3 chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 sts 2dc in next double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet in next repeat around slip_stitch to top 12m-24m skip
